# <a name="import-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="0a965-102">Importă contacte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-102">Import contacts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0a965-103">Înainte de a importa contacte Outlook pe web, veţi avea nevoie să le exporte la alte e-mail furnizorul ca fişier .csv.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-103">Before importing contacts to Outlook on the web, you'll need to export them from your other email provider as a .csv file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0a965-104">Apoi, urmaţi instrucţiunile de mai jos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-104">Then, follow the instructions below.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0a965-105">În partea de jos a paginii, selectaţi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-105">At the bottom of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0a965-106">**Oamenii**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-106">**People**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="0a965-107">Bara de instrumente, selectaţi **Manage** > **Import contacte**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-107">On the toolbar, select **Manage** > **Import contacts**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="0a965-108">Selectați **Răsfoire**, selectaţi fişierul CSV şi apoi selectaţi **Open**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-108">Select **Browse**, choose your CSV file, and then select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="0a965-109">Selectați **Import**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-109">Select **Import**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0a965-110">Pentru a afla mai multe, consultaţi [importul contactelor în Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0a965-110">To learn more, see [Import contacts to Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web).</span></span>
